StudyInfo.StudyNameEntrez: RNAseq Transcriptomic Analyses of European Ancestry samples in MGS Dataset

Policy.acknowledgement_statement: The study “RNAseq Transcriptomic Analyses of European Ancestry samples in MGS Dataset” of dataset(s) used for the analyses described in this manuscript were obtained from dbGaP found at http://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/gap through dbGaP study accession numbers phs[will be provided]. This Data Set was provided by Drs. Pablo V. Gejman, Harald H. H. Göring, and Alan R. Sanders. These investigators and collaborators request that publications resulting from these data cite their original publications: Duan J, Sanders AR, Moy W, Drigalenko EI, Brown EC, Freda J, Leites C, Göring HH; MGS, Gejman PV. Transcriptome outlier analysis implicates schizophrenia susceptibility genes and enriches putatively functional rare genetic variants. Hum Mol Genet. 2015 Aug 15;24(16):4674-85. doi: 10.1093/hmg/ddv199. Epub 2015 May 28. PMID: 26022996. PMCID: PMC4512633.; Sanders AR, Drigalenko EI, Duan J, Moy W, Freda J, Göring HHH, Gejman PV. Transcriptome sequencing study implicates immune-related genes differentially expressed in schizophrenia: new data and a meta-analysis. Transl Psychiatry. 2017 Apr 18;7(4):e1093. doi: 10.1038/tp.2017.47. PMID: 28418402. PMCID: PMC5416689.; and Duan J, Göring HHH, Sanders AR, Moy W, Freda J, Drigalenko EI, Kos M, He D, Gejman PV; MGS. Transcriptomic signatures of schizophrenia revealed by dopamine perturbation in an ex vivo model. Transl Psychiatry. 2018 Aug 16;8(1):158. doi: 10.1038/s41398-018-0216-5. PMID: 30115913. PMCID: PMC6095865. Support for the collection of the data sets was provided by grants R01MH094091 awarded to Dr. Pablo V. Gejman, R01MH094116 awarded to Dr. Harald H. H. Göring, and RC2MH090030 awarded to Dr. Alan R. Sanders through NIMH.

GSR_Access.gsr_mode_label: Unrestricted access (institution responded that the study is not sensitive without submitting a new Institutional Certification)

ConsentGroup.title: General Research Use
ConsentGroup.name: GRU
ConsentGroup.Use-Restriction: Use of the data is limited only by the terms of the model Data Use Certification.

ConsentGroup.title: Disease-Specific (Schizophrenia and related disorders)
ConsentGroup.name: DS-SZRD
ConsentGroup.Use-Restriction: Use of the data must be related to Schizophrenia and related disorders.

StudyTo.name: dbGaP Collection: Compilation of Individual-Level Genomic Data for General Research Use
